english.segment1: Landlocked eyes, jealous mind that won't stop for me now. One time find, lover's prize that won't stop for me
english.segment2: But it's you that makes the moutains move. and sets them in their places
english.segment3: The day breaks, the night falls, and don't I look the same as everyone?
english.segment4: Put their hope in one more kiss. that won't stop for me now. And hide their wounds inside their hearts. and they hardly breathe
english.segment5: the day breaks, the night falls, and don't I look the same?. But love come, and change me. so I hope in You and nothing else
english.segment6: Stone set eyes, fixed on life that won't stop
